Subject: AIC Application not working
Description:
When trying to open the AIC console on the servers that v11.6 is installed the connection is unsuccessful.
We've checked certificates on the server and IIS settings and all appears normal.
Attached screenshot of the issue.
Servers impacted: Y0775-APP0666-S; B0185-APP0701-S; B0185-APP0702-S
Solution_Comment__c:
Reinstalled AIC on B0185-APP0701-S and B0185-APP0702-S servers with the sys-SA_Envscan account.
Y00775-APP0666-S was fixed recently by the customer by switching the service account in AIC settings.
